page.title: 13HOBBIES OF CLOPHILL
page.content:
In our survey we asked if people had an{interesting hobby.}We thought you might be interested in the things we do in our{spare time.
air cadets, allotments, angling, archaeology, archery, ballet, bridge, brownies, coach driving, competitions, conservation, cooking, corn dollies, cribbage, cricket, crochet, cubs, darts, diving, dominoes, drama, dress making, flower arranging, flying, folk dance, football, gardening, guides, guitar, history, horseracing, jogging, karate, keep fit, knitting, morris dance, motor cycling, music, netball, painting, parachuting, photography, pillow lace, riding, rifle shooting, sailing, scouts, sea cadets, sewing, snooker, spinning, sub aqua diving, swimming, tropical fish, tug of war, youth orchestra. { Plus Others ???
